name: Broccoli, Rice, Cheese, and Chicken Casserole
author: Heather
summary: This is a delicious twist to broccoli, rice, and cheese casserole, and is VERY easy to make. You can also cut this in half. I use the 1 can cream of mushroom soup when I make half.  You can also leave out the onion. It just gives it a little added flavor, but is still very good without it.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium saucepan, bring the water to a boil
Mix in the instant rice, cover, and remove from heat
In a 9x13 inch baking dish, mix the prepared rice, chicken, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, butter, milk, broccoli, onion, and processed cheese
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until cheese is melted
Stir halfway through cooking to help cheese melt evenly
